title: LUXURY BROTHEL IN KOLLUPITIYA RAIDED: 3 LOCAL, 2 UZBEKISTANI WOMEN ARRESTED
content: December 04, 2010: Police raided a luxury house of ill fame located in Kollupitiya today and took into custody three local and two Uzbekistani women. The raid was conducted by the Walana Investigation Unit on a special warrant obtained from the Fort Magistrate’s Court….
